All's Well End's Well 2009
programme.desc: Yu Chu is brilliant but impossible to date. Her brother hires love expert Dick to woo her and break a curse but Yu Chu falls for him fast and won't let Dick go without a fight.

programme.title: Out of Order
programme.desc: A successful lawyer's secret affair turns into a nightmare when a corpse unexpectedly turns up in the hotel room, triggering a desperate cover-up that spirals into uncontrollable chaos.

programme.title: Young And Dangerous : Reloaded
programme.desc: Based on a popular comic featuring the adventures of a young triad gang in Mongkok, this sharp remake features a new generation in a razor-edged thriller.

programme.title: Moscow Mission
programme.desc: A Chinese police officer disguises as a businessman takes charge of an operation to arrest the criminals who perform a heist on the train, but uncovers a bigger conspiracy instead...

programme.title: Stand Up Story
programme.desc: Mancer cares for his intellectually challenged father Wah. When Mancer finds solace in stand-up comedy, he turns his life's hardships into comedic gold, from school ridicule to pandemic woes.

programme.title: No information available
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: Article 20
programme.desc: Prosecutor Han Ming battles a case of intentional injury, risking all for justice. In a gripping finale, he transforms it into a fight for fairness, defending what is right.

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: Young Chan Lok Kwun accidentally stumbles into the dangerous Kowloon Walled City, subsequently finding purpose amid chaos and gaining wisdom while becoming one of the City's protectors.

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan seeks help from psychiatrist Dr Jim. As she heals, Jim is haunted by the same disturbances when his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: Love at First Lie
programme.desc: Ordinary girl Bao meets troubled rich guy Edward. They conspire to ruin his father's remarriage and love blossoms. However, their romance takes an unexpected turn...

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Gambler
programme.desc: Manfred & Flora are a married couple with a gambling addiction. During their divorce, to decide who gets their daughter's custody right, the judge orders the couple to quit gambling for a week.

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: A triad leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business, but Ah Lok is actually an undercover policeman who unveils a shocking political conspiracy.

programme.title: One and Only
programme.desc: A veteran and a passionate street dancer both strive to reach their goals and pursue their dreams in street dancing. After overcoming many challenges, can they finally shine on stage?

programme.title: The White Storm 3: Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Two undercover cops successfully develop a brotherly bond with a Thai drug lord. When the police busts the syndicate, the drug lord discovers that there is betrayal within his circle of trust...

programme.title: Dummy Mommy Without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen fakes a pregnancy to keep her job when she finds out that she is about to be fired. She begins to feel guilty about her lie when she receives much care from her colleagues.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: Starring Donnie Yen, Nicholas Tse, an inspector discovers that the team of masked thugs who killed his co-workers are led by a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him.

programme.title: The Ex-Files 4: Marriage Plan
programme.desc: Two brothers, Yun and Fei, face challenges in love. Yun dodges family pressure to marry after his breakup, and Fei and his girlfriend opt for a 'marriage cooling-off period' to tackle marriage issues.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: When a low-rank triad member is informed by 3 cops that he is an undercover police officer who lost his memory, he is forced to search for the truth when he falls in love with one of the cops.

programme.title: No information available
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: A family torn apart 8 years ago during a disastrous winter solstice dinner reunites when their cousin returns home from England, hoping to mend relations after things had fallen apart.

programme.title: Battle Of The Wolf
programme.desc: A former special forces sergeant must protect his wife and fellow passengers aboard a hijacked plane, using his courage and tactical expertise to take down the terrorists and ensure everyone's safety.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 97
programme.desc: Mr. Lo's sons prank Kung on his birthday with a fake lottery win, sparking chaos that unexpectedly heals old wounds and brings the quirky family closer together.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel features the plight of Hong Kong's grassroots performing artists fighting against the government's plan to gentrify an industrial district where they lived.

programme.title: No One Like Me
programme.desc: Yang Qian Huan, once a golden boy, sees his glory fade after the birth of Xu Qi An. Yet, rising from his downfall, Yang defiantly forges his own path, refusing to bow to fate.
